Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky brown (fired reddish in places); reserved edge of foot; trace of white slip on underside; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the shape of the foot, see Lemos no. 1071 from Marion.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 47)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1057) (phase 2)
